messages.title: YOUR PRIORITIES FOR OUR NHS
messages.content: I am proud of the NHS and the principles of free care that underpin it. Our NHS is a fantastic institution—and we can improve it.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase spending on the NHS year on year, put patients in the driving seat—giving you the right to choose your GP, your consultant and your hospital; reduce the amount of box-ticking and targets enabling NHS staff to do what they do best—looking after our health; add 4,200 more health visitors to give families the support they need; restore access to an NHS dentist to a million people.

mentions.tacticalSituation: PS: Remember—we need a Conservative MP in Brighton Pavilion if we are going to change the government in Westminster

issues.health: Increase spending on the NHS year on year, put patients in the driving seat—giving you the right to choose your GP, your consultant and your hospital; reduce the amount of box-ticking and targets enabling NHS staff to do what they do best—looking after our health; add 4,200 more health visitors to give families the support they need; restore access to an NHS dentist to a million people.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud of the NHS and the principles of free care that underpin it. Our NHS is a fantastic institution—and we can improve it.

images.caption: Charlotte Vere, Conservative Parliamentary Candidate for Brighton Pavilion
